subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Maryland offensive coordinator James Franklin was named as the eventual successor to Ralph Friedgen, putting him in line to become the Terrapins’ first black head football coach. There was no specific timeline for how long Franklin, 37, would be the coach-in-waiting. Friedgen, 61, has three years remaining on his contract and has not indicated that he is ready to step aside.
